entry.data:
SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
